title: VirtualDyno
help_cv: Engine power in horsepower (1 CV = 735.5 Watts)
help_kg: Vehicle weight in kilograms including passengers and cargo
help_densitaAria: Air density calculated using ρ = P/(R·T) where P is air pressure in Pa, R = 287.05 J/(kg·K), T is temperature in Kelvin
help_cd: Drag coefficient (0.25-0.45 for cars, 0.6-1.0 for trucks)
help_areaFrontale: Frontal area in m² (typically 2-2.5 m² for cars)
help_trazione: Drive type affects weight distribution and traction
error_fields: Please fill all required fields (CV, KG, Frontal Area)
help_minrpm: Number of revolutions per minute (RPM) at which the engine starts delivering power
help_maxrpm: Number of revolutions per minute (RPM) at which the engine can operate before reaching the safety limit or engine efficiency
